profile.title: Your Profile (Amharic)
profile.connectWalletDescription: Connect your Polkadot wallet (e.g., Nova, Talisman, Polkadot.js) to display your account. (AM)

welcome.title: Welcome! (AM)
welcome.subtitle: Your friendly guide to understanding Blockchain & Polkadot, powered by {{appName}} (AM).

interactive.title: Learn Interactively (AM)
interactive.line1: Engage in conversations to explore complex topics. (AM)
interactive.line2: Dynamic visuals help bring abstract concepts to life. (AM)

aiFeatures.title: Smart & Accessible (AM)
aiFeatures.line1: Get AI-powered assistance tailored to your questions. (AM)
aiFeatures.line2: Use voice commands for a hands-free learning experience. (AM)
aiFeatures.voiceNoteNoSupport: Your browser doesn't fully support voice commands, but AI chat is here for you! (AM)
aiFeatures.note: AI is constantly learning, but always verify critical information. (AM)

personalize.title: Let's Personalize Your Learning! (AM)
personalize.description1: Tell us a bit about your background, current role, or area of expertise (e.g., "Software Developer", "Student in Finance", "Marketing Manager", "Curious about Web3") (AM).
personalize.description2: This will help us tailor examples and explanations to what you already know, making complex topics easier to grasp (AM).
personalize.textAreaPlaceholder: E.g., 'Frontend developer with 3 years experience', 'Marketing professional new to tech', 'Economics student' (AM)

errors.unknownAiError: An unknown error occurred with the AI service (Amharic).

initialPrompts.basics: I'm new to blockchain. Can you give me a simple introduction to Blockchain Basics to get me started? (Amharic)
initialPrompts.polkadot: I have some blockchain knowledge. Please provide an overview of Polkadot, focusing on its key features and architecture for advanced users. Try to use information from the Polkadot Wiki (Amharic).

whatIsBlockchain.title: What is a Blockchain? (Amharic)
whatIsBlockchain.description: Understand the fundamental concept of a distributed ledger (Amharic).

howBlockchainWorks.title: How Does Blockchain Work? (Amharic)
howBlockchainWorks.description: Learn about blocks, chains, and cryptographic hashing (Amharic).

typesOfBlockchains.title: Types of Blockchains (Amharic)
typesOfBlockchains.description: Explore Public, Private, and Consortium blockchains (Amharic).

smartContractsExplained.title: Smart Contracts Explained (Amharic)
smartContractsExplained.description: Discover self-executing contracts with predefined rules (Amharic).

polkadotArchitecture.title: Polkadot Architecture (Amharic)

polkadotGovernance.title: Polkadot Governance (Amharic)

substrateFramework.title: Substrate Framework (Amharic)
